title: Simple Internal Initiative
problem: Team spends 10 hours/week manually generating reports that could be automated

title: Cross-Functional Process Improvement
problem: Customer onboarding takes 30 days, causing 20% churn before activation
solution: Streamline onboarding with self-service tools and automated workflows
impact: Reduce onboarding time to 7 days, decrease pre-activation churn from 20% to 5%

title: Strategic Business Initiative
problem: Company lacks competitive differentiation in enterprise market, losing 3 deals/month to competitors
solution: Develop enterprise-grade security and compliance features
impact: Win 80% of enterprise deals (vs. current 40%), increase ARR by $2M annually

title: Cost Optimization Initiative
problem: Cloud infrastructure costs growing 15%/month, outpacing revenue growth
solution: Implement cost optimization: right-sizing, reserved instances, and auto-scaling
impact: Reduce monthly cloud spend from $50K to $30K (40% reduction), save $240K/year

title: Customer Experience Enhancement
problem: Customer support tickets increased 200% in 6 months, NPS dropped from 45 to 32
solution: Build self-service knowledge base and in-app guidance
impact: Reduce support tickets by 50%, improve NPS from 32 to 50

title: New Market Entry
problem: Current product only serves US market, missing $5M opportunity in EU
solution: Internationalize product: multi-language, GDPR compliance, EU data centers
impact: Enter EU market, target $5M ARR in Year 1, $15M by Year 3

title: Technical Debt Reduction
problem: Legacy codebase causing 40% of engineering time spent on bug fixes vs. new features
solution: Refactor core modules, improve test coverage from 30% to 80%
impact: Reduce bug fix time from 40% to 15%, increase feature velocity by 60%

title: Competitive Response Initiative
problem: Competitor launched AI features, causing 30% of prospects to choose them over us
impact: Match competitor capabilities, win back 25% of lost deals, increase win rate from 40% to 55%
